usefulItems: small pitcher, dessert glasses, ice cube trays, freezable storage container, refrigerator, freezer
title: Lychee Sorbet with Vodka

preparations.content: Drain lychee syrup through simmering basket into a pitcher and transfer syrup into ice cube trays (approx. 10 oz liquid). Place in freezer for 4 hours or overnight, until frozen. Place drained lychees in refrigerator until ready to use.
Place sugar and mint into mixing bowl and grind <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>.
Add lychee fruit and frozen lychee ice cubes and crush <b>5-10 sec/speed 8<b>, or until smooth. Transfer into a freezable storage container and place in freezer for 4 hours or until frozen.
Divide sorbet between 4 dessert glasses and add 1 tbsp vodka to each. Serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: Any fruit sorbet would work well in this cocktail.
For a non-alcoholic drink, place a scoop of lychee sorbet into a tall glass and fill with any lemon-lime or club soda.
